reviewText: We put it in our office over the holidays and it really made us feel calmer and warmer just hearing the crackling.  We are in Minnesota so every chance of heat, even pretend, is welcome!

This video exceeded our expectations - - definitely the best we have seen. The fires (you can choose from two) are gorgeous and the crackling audio is perfect. It really does look and feel like an actual wood burning fireplace.  My family loves it. This is the ambience we have been missing.
